description:
Illegal migrants are being given private healthcare while being put up in a Greater Manchester hotel despite Labour's pledge to stop using hotels and a local NHS walk-in centre being shut down.

The post Private Healthcare for Illegal Migrants Put Up in Hotel While NHS Walk-In Centre Shuts Down appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Private Healthcare for Illegal Migrants Put Up in Hotel While NHS Walk-In Centre Shuts Down

description:
Following the tragic suicide of an Oxford student after he was shunned by friends, Clinical Psychologist Dr. Carole Sherwood asks what kind of society we have become when students live in constant fear of being cancelled.

The post The Cruelty of Cancel Culture appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Cruelty of Cancel Culture

description:
Flying became less safe now that pilots are Covid vaccinated, says safety expert Nick Hunt. That's because MHRA has admitted that it failed to share an alarming report from Pfizer with the air safety authority.

The post Flying is Less Safe Now Pilots are Covid Vaccinated appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Flying is Less Safe Now Pilots are Covid Vaccinated

description:
Journalist Allison Pearson was visited by police on Remembrance Sunday over a 'non-crime hate incident' linked to an online post. Law expert Dr Kyriakos N. Kotsoglou says it's high time free speech was restored.

The post Allison Pearson’s Police Ordeal Over ‘Non-Crime Hate Incident’ Shows it’s High Time Free Speech Was Restored appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Allison Pearson’s Police Ordeal Over ‘Non-Crime Hate Incident’ Shows it’s High Time Free Speech Was Restored

description:
Elon Musk has been appointed to lead Donald Trump's new Department of Government Efficiency alongside fellow entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy in what has been dubbed "the Manhattan Project of our time".

The post Elon Musk to Lead New Department of Government Efficiency Dubbed “the Manhattan Project of Our Time” appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Elon Musk to Lead New Department of Government Efficiency Dubbed “the Manhattan Project of Our Time”

description:
The war on fertiliser has come to Britain, says Chris Morrison, with Labour imposing a 'carbon' import duty on the farming essential. Not content with making Brits colder and poorer, they are making us hungrier.

The post The War on Fertiliser Comes to Britain appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The War on Fertiliser Comes to Britain

description:
Keir Starmer and Ed Miliband are at COP29 to "show leadership on the climate challenge". The trouble is, says Ben Pile, no one is following, and the U.K. is just looking more and more ridiculous.

The post Starmer and Miliband “Show Leadership” at COP29 But No One is Following appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Starmer and Miliband “Show Leadership” at COP29 But No One is Following

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
